author: Kleppten

changelog.release_notes:
FindBikes shows you the direction, distance and street address of the nearest bike rental station within a square km around your current position. It displays also the operator. As you move towards the station it recalculates the distance. 

The app relies on Open Street Map Data. So if you find insufficient or incorrect information please go to openstreetmap.org to correct this for you and future users. Please help to keep public location data free and donate to http://donate.openstreetmap.org/

description:
FindBikes shows you the direction, distance and street address of the nearest bike rental station within a square km around your current position. It displays also the operator. As you move towards the station it recalculates the distance and heading.

The app relies on Open Street Map Data. So if you find insufficient or incorrect information please go to openstreetmap.org to correct this for you and future users. Please help to keep public location data free and donate to http://donate.openstreetmap.org/
